info.name: Compact Dark For Thunderbird (DevEdition Theme)
info.description: This style ports Firefox's <strike>Dev Edition dark</strike> Compact Dark theme to Thunderbird.
info.additionalInfo:
It is based on Laron's Numix Tabs for Thunderbird 15+ and Firefox Dev Edition. https://userstyles.org/styles/117550/numix-tabs-for-thunderbird-15 https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/developer/

You need a lightweight theme in order to make the toolbar icons appear white. Any dark theme should work, but in my testing I used Just black. https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/just-black/

Light theme here: https://userstyles.org/styles/126806/compact-light-for-thunderbird-devedition-theme
